faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services.

q1.question: What types of data can you help us annotate?
q1.answer: We provide annotation services for a wide range of data types including text, images, video, and audio. Our services cover everything from basic labeling to complex segmentation tasks for machine learning and AI applications.

q2.question: How do you ensure data security and confidentiality?
q2.answer: We follow strict data security protocols compliant with international standards. All our annotators sign confidentiality agreements, and we can implement additional security measures based on your specific requirements, including secure infrastructure and access controls.

q3.question: What is the typical turnaround time for projects?
q3.answer: Project timelines vary based on the complexity and volume of data. We provide detailed timeline estimates during the project scoping phase. For urgent needs, we can allocate additional resources to accelerate delivery while maintaining quality standards.

q4.question: Do you offer custom annotation services for specific industries?
q4.answer: Yes, we specialize in domain-specific annotation across various industries including healthcare, legal, retail, automotive, and more. Our team receives specialized training to understand the nuances and requirements of each industry's data.

q5.question: How do you handle quality control in the annotation process?
q5.answer: We implement a multi-layered quality control system including consensus scoring, gold standard tasks, blind reviews, and regular performance reviews. This ensures consistent accuracy and reliability in our annotation output.

faq.contactPrompt: Don't see your question answered here? Contact us directly.
